headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GROUP, IDA JEAN.IDA JEAN GROUP

lead_paragraph: GROUP--Ida Jean.Ida Jean Group, 85 passed away July 26th. She epitomized what a mother, wife and friend should be. She was beautiful, loving nurturing, intelligent, compassionate and loved. She will be missed and emulated by her three children. A finer human being never walked this earth.
